text: @FOX4 It IS unacceptable and @GregAbbott_TX is to blame. He refused to allow counties/cities to enforce his order or their own, and then reopened the state too early. Even seeing COVID-19 cases triple, he declines to do something except give stern warnings. He is a poor leader.
